Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Okay, let's try to figure out how to group these events into cases. So, each case is a separate patient journey, but there's no case ID given. I need to look at the events and see which ones belong together based on the activities, timing, and other attributes.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Starting with event 1: Register patient in ER, 45M, private insurance. Then event 2: another Register patient in ER, 62F, public. Event 3: Register in Surgery, 28M, private. Hmm, so three different patients being registered at the start.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Then event 4: Initial triage in ER, 45M. That's the same age and gender as event 1's patient. So maybe event 1 and 4 are the same case? Because they're both ER patients with the same age and gender.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me check the timestamps. Event 1 is at 08:05:13, event 4 is 08:10:50. That's about 5 minutes later, which makes sense for triage after registration.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Event 5: Initial triage in ER, 62F. That matches event 2's patient. So events 2 and 5 might be the same case. Event 6: Doctor consultation in Surgery, 28M. That's the same as event 3's patient. So events 3 and 6 could be the same case. Event 7: X-ray imaging in Radiology, 45M. Again, same as event 1 and 4. So this is probably the same case as event 1.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let's make tables for each possible patient. Case 1: 45M, ER, private insurance. Events: 1. Register patient (ER) 4. Initial triage (ER) - same age/gender 7. X-ray (Radiology) - same age/gender 12. Doctor consultation (ER) - same 15. Discharged (ER) - same. So events 1,4,7,12,15.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Check timestamps: 1 at 08:05, 4 at 08:10, 7 at 08:15, 12 at 08:23, 15 at 08:30. The timing seems sequential. After triage, X-ray, then doctor consultation, then discharge.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Let me check if all events are covered. Case 1: 5 events. Case 2: 7 events. Case 3: 6 events. Total 18 events. Yes, that adds up.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Another check: event 10 is lab completed for 62F. Then event 11 is doctor consultation in ER for 62F. Makes sense. Event 14 is prescription for 62F (antibiotics), which would be after diagnosis of minor infection. Event 11 says diagnosis=minor_infection. So the doctor consultation (11) leads to prescription (14). Yes, that's a logical sequence.
